channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 30

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: Thanks Ben. Hopefully, I'll catch up to you soon :)
item.content:encoded: Thanks Ben. Hopefully, I’ll catch up to you soon ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Amen to that! The fact that you can look at your old games and see what you would have done differently is certainly a sign of improvement. Keep on moving forward!
item.content:encoded: Amen to that! The fact that you can look at your old games and see what you would have done differently is certainly a sign of improvement. Keep on moving forward!

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: Looking back on this game, I realize that if I were put in the position of choosing move 109 again, I would do F8 instead of F10. I remember wanting to try out a tesuji but after doing some pretty important life & death, tesuji and endgame problems, I probably wouldn't have tried it at this point in the game. Goes to show how your reading improves when you practice Go problems, no matter how annoying/redundant they may seem :)
item.content:encoded: Looking back on this game, I realize that if I were put in the position of choosing move 109 again, I would do F8 instead of F10. I remember wanting to try out a tesuji but after doing some pretty important life & death, tesuji and endgame problems, I probably wouldn’t have tried it at this point in the game. Goes to show how your reading improves when you practice Go problems, no matter how annoying/redundant they may seem ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Glad you enjoyed the review! We will be sure to play again in the near future. Looking forward to it!
item.content:encoded: Glad you enjoyed the review! We will be sure to play again in the near future. Looking forward to it!

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: Hello, Thanks a lot for the review. I just realized how many chances you actually gave me to live but I neglected them. As I'm looking at the game now, I was perfectly connected with a large knight's move but just got a little proud. We should play again sometime. Thanks again for the review. Bye!
item.content:encoded:
Hello,
Thanks a lot for the review. I just realized how many chances you actually gave me to live but I neglected them. As I’m looking at the game now, I was perfectly connected with a large knight’s move but just got a little proud. We should play again sometime. Thanks again for the review.
Bye!
